skillTree.localised_description: Once trained to carry a man in battle, Imperial griffons are poised killers and incredibly dedicated to their riders.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: They search warp stone. They have no respect, they spawn evil

effects.description:
Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +50%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: They should be stopped

effects.description:
Bonus vs Infantry: +5 when fighting against Skaven
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Mother Earth is pregnant

effects.description:
Hidden. Hiddne is a typo
	(accompanying Lord)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +15

skillTree.localised_description: Bestowed with unwavering power, Allor intervenes with his Amber magic to ensure the survival of Ceridan and Carlsson in their direst moments

effects.description:
Bonus vs Infantry: +10 for Ceridan, Carlsson Guard, and Carlsson Cavalry
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: He preserves life and restores vitality in the face of peril

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached

skillTree.localised_description: Infused with Amber's might, Allor imparts reduced winds of magic costs and cooldowns, hastening spellcasting with unparalleled mastery

effects.description: Cooldown: -25% to Lore of Beasts spells
Winds of Magic cost: -10% for Lore of Beasts spells

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.
With a mighty bellow, the caster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs units with 25 or more entities
Strong vs units with 25 or more entities
Strong vs units with 25 or more entities

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flock of Doom"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Calling upon the beast spirits of the wild, the caster sheathes vulnerable flesh in unyielding fur and hide.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Sounding a gnarled horn, the caster summons a glowing amber spear and hurls it at the foe with uncanny accuracy.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Amber Spear"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Nebulous nature spirits assail the foe, clawing at them with hands not nearly as insubstantial as they appear.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Kadon, a master of forms, was able to shift his shape into anything he chose. This mastery is used to summon a Manticore, as if Kadon himself fights for you.

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawned unit fights in this battle only
Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -6 for "Transformation of Kadon"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can pass through trees.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
